amendment.description: To require States that elect to combine funding for early childhood education and care to describe the manner in which they use the combined funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2824 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2824 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Bennet.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2824 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2824 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Bennet.
